# Nested Lists

## Unordered Nested

- Level 1 item A
  - Level 2 item A.1
  - Level 2 item A.2
    - Level 3 item A.2.1
    - Level 3 item A.2.2
  - Level 2 item A.3
- Level 1 item B
  - Level 2 item B.1

## Ordered Nested

1. First item
   1. Sub-item 1.1
   2. Sub-item 1.2
      1. Sub-sub-item 1.2.1
2. Second item
   1. Sub-item 2.1

## Mixed Nesting

1. Ordered parent
   - Unordered child
   - Another unordered child
     1. Back to ordered
     2. Still ordered
2. Second ordered parent
   - Dash list child
   - Another dash child

## Deep Nesting (5 levels)

- Level 1
  - Level 2
    - Level 3
      - Level 4
        - Level 5

## Lists with Content

- Item with paragraph

  This is a continuation paragraph under the list item.
  It should be indented properly.

- Another item

  Another continuation paragraph.
